thread.title: Colin
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Colin

author: Colin
title: Colin
text:
I installed a leakage protector strip on 2 side's of my conventional sized bath & found they fitted as well as anticipated.
The instructions / information was simple to read & understand.
The silicon sealer was very fluid so easy to use & is as stated very white so it is visually striking.
I have 2 negative comments to make perhaps the bath strip could be a 10 x 10mm to make it a less visually impact to see this strip along the wall sides.
And to include in the kit a silicon smoother as recommended to have.
